title: Drawing, George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Radiator Enclosure and Shelving, August 10, 1934
title_raw: George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Radiator Enclosure and Shelving
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 520-7, 3/4 & FS./RAND, J.B./8/10/34, 8/13/34, 4/  8/30/34, 8/30/34, 4; inscribed in graphite, lower left: SECTION C.C. THRU/SLIDING TRAYS; upper right: F.S. SEC. THRU RADIATOR ENCLOSURE/SECTION A-A; center right: RADIATOR ENCLOSURE/PLAN; dimensions in graphite
description: Drawings for radiator enclosure and elevation of shelving unit (?). Floor to ceiling wood shelves at left and right of wall, sliding trays at center, extending half way up the wall. Enclosed radiator beneath window.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Radiator Enclosure and Shelving, August 10, 1934; Office of Donald Deskey Associates ; USA; graphite on tracing paper; H x W: 90.2 x 160 cm (35 1/2 in. x 5 ft. 3 in.); Gift of Donald Deskey; 1975-11-526
